What we have here is not only a 15 year old game that's still fun to play in 2018, but a WWII game that, unlike Battlefield V, is actually fun to play.
Pick it up and help populate its community more. Word of mouth does wonders to help the popularity of something.

Looking for a good WWII game? Want a game with a wide variety of powerful weapons for any playstyle? History nerd like me who loves to play games relating to past wars? Possibly you’re sick of all your other games and want to try a new FPS? Or maybe you like other Valve FPS games such as Team Fortress or Half-Life. If you said yes to any of these, this game is for you. It doesn’t have the best graphics, but it has amazing maps, and amazingly, still some running servers! The weapons are really satisfying, and the stamina system is realistic. All in all, this is an amazing game, further proving that Valve never fails to please.

A neat WWII  based FPS...

graphically challenged for modern times and there are plenty of other out there that will exceed all expectations.

Sound engine will remind you of how old this title is if the graphics do not but it's not horrible.

Gameplay is simple and easy to pickup.

The fact that this runs without any configuration on modern systems is amazing.

It's a fun shooter that has extended beyond it's prime and I would say add this to your collection but beware that noone plays this anymore.

Although the graphics have aged quite badly and the player base has dwindled down pretty low, this game is still a good buy on sale. This game can run on a potato and has very fun and satisfying gunplay.
This might also be a good buy if your computer can't quite run Day of Defeat Source.

Great game, just like Dod: Source is. But this one has something DoD: Source doesn't: It has more classes to play, it has more weapons, it has more playermodels and besides the American and Axis factions, there is also a British faction. You won't regret if you buy this one or Dod: Source. Both Day of Defeat games are excellent

This is actually a pretty fun game that still has a small community as of 2018. It is easy to learn and still gives you a lot of fun and enjoyment, especially if you have / find some friends. 

The reason why I don't really recommend it is primarily that the community is pretty small. There also isn't much reason not to just play the remake (Day of Defeat: Source) that features a larger community and runs on a newer game engine.

There are 2 types of people that play this game: The die hard fans, and the people that got it in the Valve Complete Pack and play it for less than a hour. This is a really awesome and simple WW2 game where the allies and the axis try to capture points. While DOD Source has better visuals and collision, I still prefer the original over it. Really awesome simple retro WW2 game to pass time. Totally worth $5. 

Wait until a sale to buy this, it goes on sale for like 99 cents.

This is one of the more arcadey type WW2 games. It is great! The blood effect coming out of people you shot, the classes (Modern games have pretty much abandoned classes) and the easy to pick up and play-gameplay all come together in this fun game. The graphics may not be that great but you are forgeting one crucial thing: It's from 2003.

Sure, there is not Workshop support or really anything to support the gameplay like achievements or unlockables. (I don't personally think that unlockables would work in a game like this but still). But that is okay because the gameplay itself is fun at it's core. I don't have 1 000+ hours on this game but it is fun to boot up every now and then.

(For the mouse issue, consult the Mouse-tab on the Settings. I honestly don't know why Raw imput is not on by default)

Did I mention that this is only four euros?
Extremely fun game, I recommend it if you enjoy WWII FPS.
Better than call of duty

This game is fantastic, even though its old, it still has its charm of being an arcade style realistic shooter.
Unlike its sequel, Day of Defeat Source, this has more gameplay elements too it, more classes and even a British Faction!
It's a shame that some stuff from the mod didnt come through but its still a good game to play.

The gunplay feels solid and the community is still playing it even to this day!

Jedná sa o skvelú modifikáciu na hru Half-Life na báze GoldSrc enginu. Celé sa to odohráva počas 2. svetovej vojny najmä na bojištiach západnej Európi. 

+ cena
+ herná doba
+ mapy
+ GoldSrc engine
+ zbrane, vojská
+ tímová spolupráca

- bugy
- žiadny boti

+/- cez deň málo hráčov, ale večer to kompenzuje

9/10

Záver:
Jednoznačne a jednohlasne kupujte, nemáte čo ztratiť. Je to niečo veľmi perfektné. Musíte si to kúpiť.

Day of Defeat es un juego militar que tira más por lo realista, es en este punto donde se separa de otros shooters de la epoca dando paso a las destrucciones a tiempo real, y además nos ofrece una barra de estamina y una de salud, dandole así un aspecto más real que limita al jugador para que se preocupe por lo que puede hacer y lo que no (la estamina se gasta muy rapido lo cual no es muy comodo, cosa que se arregla en el source). sus mapas y clases estan bien llegando estas a cambiar en ocasiones dependiendo del mapa.
en cuanto a las armas está muy bien cuidado y balancealo para ambos equipos, y con las diferentes clases se hace más variada la experiencia de juego.
El juego es divertido, lastima que no hay gente y me andan los sv a 300 de ping
